website_summaries.verdict: This high-quality commercial-grade sink offers supreme functionality alongside a wonderful reputation.
pros: Comes with faucet and built-in sides for splash protection
Compact design is perfect for small businesses and spaces
Water faucet handles feature a turning knob for convenience
cons: Sink can be difficult to mount

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Product ... Caution
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for our restaurant. We had them professionally installed by a licensed contractor. The plumber returned twice to stop the dripping from the back of the faucets. After Teflon tape and pipe joint compound was heavily applied we finally had no leakage. Another month passed before we could open. Both sinks in two locations are dropping out on the hot sides. Hot water starts then shuts off on its own or goes into a death rattle. The plumber came back again. He got them to work properly for about two hours before they started acting up again. Now too much time has passed to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for a tight area
customer_reviews.text: Great solution for a tight area. Mounting is easy. You do need to purchase 2 right angle 1/2 inch brass elbows (note: they are pricey) if the water lines will be run on the surface of the wall. Had problem with a leak in the faucet assembly; contacted supplier via Amazon; got the necessary part very quickly. Problem "resolution" was handled in an excellent manner.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Sink is fine, faucet terrible
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because the sink (so far) is a good value, but the faucet is crap. No clear stops when shutting off, and after using literally a few times the cold started to leak. Sink mounting system isn't solid but got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Hand sink
customer_reviews.text: Hand sink for my bakery, is functional and compact. Cleans well for a professional sink, still polishes very well. Originally was sent without faucet but Amazon was very accommodating.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Bound

customer_reviews.title: very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.text: rust spots in whats called stainless steel. very disapointing and will likely draw the attention of NSF auditor apon inspection.
customer_reviews.author: matt smith

customer_reviews.title: Great but there are some faults.
customer_reviews.text: The splash guards are not welded on, instead they are attached and then caulked. The caulking fails. I still order from gridmann as their quality seems to be increasing. I think it comes to experience and they're starting to hone in on better manufacturing techniques.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J. Pawson

customer_reviews.title: ... is very poorly designed the overall product is a good quality you will just have to do additional support ...
customer_reviews.text: the mounting on this is very poorly designed the overall product is a good quality you will just have to do additional support to anchor it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and looks good. Go ahead and throw away the included faucet
customer_reviews.text: Sink is inexpensive, and looks good. Go ahead and throw away the included faucet, it leaked past the sealing gaskets for the hot and cold side after first use. We tried putting new gaskets in, using larger gaskets, and even sanding the sealing surface for a better seal. Nothing fixed this faucet. Buy a different one to go with the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hearon

customer_reviews.title: Faucet is horribly cheap.....
customer_reviews.text: The sink is what it is. A serviceable stainless steel sink. The caulk on the seems was coming out. It needed to be re-caulked. And the faucet is just crap. Worked about a week before it started having problems. Instead of fussing with it I just purchased a T&S brass replacement and know it will work without issue for 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our requirements
customer_reviews.text: This handsink was perfect for industrial applications in a food service setting. We installed it next to the time clock so employees can wash their hands after clocking in before entering the production area.
customer_reviews.author: Levy Elegino

customer_reviews.title: Crummy FAUCET
customer_reviews.text: The design is exactly what I needed for my shop BUT the hot water doesn’t work and the knobs are all weird. I’ve had my Plummer come check it out multiple times and finally decided it is a defective faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great sink
customer_reviews.text: It works great for my garage hand sink. very well built a great little sink
customer_reviews.author: Gerald K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sink. Mounts easily especially if you are replacing ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sink. Mounts easily especially if you are replacing a similar sink. Be advised you need to buy the 90 degree copper adapters to direct the water supply to your valves.
customer_reviews.author: T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: It's great. You can get the "elbow" that you connect ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my patio to use when I am grilling. It's great. You can get the "elbow" that you connect the supply lines to at Home Depot. About 8 bucks a piece. Don't like the knobs but I'll get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: jeaniestoots

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little hand wash sink
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little hand wash sink. Love the sides, came with the faucet. Do not like the fact that the edges on the side pieces are very sharp. Needs to have a rubber trim.
customer_reviews.author: Emma McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sink. We purchased this for our cafe we ...
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery! Very nice sink. We purchased this for our cafe we are currently working on opening
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Nice sink and not expensive
customer_reviews.text: Nice sink and not expensive. Resolved the issue I have at the shop with the guys splashing soap on the walls!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Sink is nice faucet is complete garbage
customer_reviews.text: Sink is nice faucet is complete garbage. Lasted about 5 weeks of moderate to lite use before cold water side started to stip out on handle.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with my purchase of a Gridmann commercial stainless steel ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my purchase of a Gridmann commercial stainless steel hand washing sink. The price was very competitive, the quality of the product was excellent and I received it promptly. I have no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: It seems like that I was shipped a returned item. A lot of scratched and visually looked used.
customer_reviews.author: ivan ivan

customer_reviews.title: Faucet is very cheap. I bought it March 2 and after 1 1/2 month it’s worthless
customer_reviews.text: For some reason our hot side water don’t work. Water is on but gives problem. So for now I have hot water hooked up on cold side. Please don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: this is the sink you are looking for
customer_reviews.text: excellent fit, easy to get set up and running. great condition right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Vega

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great perfect size, and the side panels are necessary for my chocolate lab
customer_reviews.author: bigpapa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Buying for a food truck, sink was surprisingly bigger than expected considering price was a still
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OSHA approved
customer_reviews.text: We own a small restaurant and this sink is perfect and is page approved
customer_reviews.author: Claire Mead

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice fits exactly well. Almost to big but fits. Everything works fine
customer_reviews.author: Chao

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for food truck.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. I have seen these at auctions go for over $100. Seems really sturdy. Just installed it but have not tested yet.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Taylor

customer_reviews.title: ... these for our shop hand washing only they were perfect They are a nice small
customer_reviews.text: i bought these for our shop hand washing only they were perfect They are a nice small sink
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best deal
customer_reviews.text: Best price I could find for a handwashing sink complete with faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. .great product. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Boy

customer_reviews.title: The sink is fine, the faucet assembly is the problem
customer_reviews.text: The sink is fine, the faucet assembly is the problem. The cold faucet handle was stripped right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Augustine

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL SINK
customer_reviews.text: This sink is fabulous. Got it for our church kitchen and everyone is thrilled. Free shipping was a bonus. And the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Holmstrom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It isn't a high end sink but it is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Korn

customer_reviews.title: The fit and finish could've been a little better nice sinkbut it did come with a couple small ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish could've been a little better nice sinkbut it did come with a couple small minor dings
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product can't wait to get them installed will be ordering more products later great deal
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Whitson

customer_reviews.title: We were pleased with that
customer_reviews.text: The sink was all that was advertised. Well made. We were pleased with that. The Faucet is NOT ADA compliant with short handles and we cannot get it to stop leaking. Our plumber had to replace the handles at a cost almost as much as the whole unit but the WORSE is he has spent three different session trying to get it to stop leaking - both hot and cold. How do we get it to stop leaking? Who will pay for the replacement? We have a kitchen to open!!!
customer_reviews.author: Norman Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son-in-law for their downstairs bathroom, it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: GRIDMANN Commercial NSF Stainless Steel Sink with Faucet & Sidesplashes - Wall Mount Hand Washing Basin
product_meta.description: This heavy-duty wall-mount sink by Gridmann is constructed from 18-gauge #304 stainless-steel, and is the perfect hand sink for use in a kitchen, bar, restaurant, laundry, school, hospital, hotel, park, or any other commercial setting. It is NSF certified to meet strict standards for public health protection and built for high-volume use to last a lifetime. This basin features a large bowl size with plenty of room for hand washing, side and backsplashes 7-5/8" tall, and a pre-drilled backsplash to accept the included gooseneck chrome faucet. It also has a wall mount bracket for easy installation (screws/anchors required for installation and not included), a 1/2" wide drip channel surrounding the bowl, a stainless-steel basket strainer, and an attractive honed finish. Fast and easy assembly. Overall size: 17" wide, 15-1/2" front to back, 17-5/8" overall height (including faucet and drain). Bowl size: 14" x 10" x 5" deep. Faucet mounting holes: 4" on-center. Faucet connection: Standard 1/2" male pipe thread. Spout clearance: 13-1/2" from bowl bottom (to bottom edge of spout). Drain connection: Made to fit a standard 1-1/2" tailpiece/trap. Includes: Sink as pictured, gooseneck faucet, basket strainer drain (trap not included), and wall mount bracket.
